properties.name: Amazon Publishing
properties.description: Leading publisher of trade fiction, nonfiction, and children’s books with offices in Seattle and around the world.

properties.name: becker&mayer!
properties.description: Leading creator, producer, and manufacturer of innovative books for adults as well as books and toy products for children.

properties.name: Chatwin Books
properties.description: Publisher specializing in literary fiction, poetry, fine art, and photography books, with a smattering of eclectic titles.

properties.name: Chin Music Press
properties.description: Indie publisher and bookstore offering beautiful, engaging books.

properties.name: Entre Ríos Books
properties.description: Small press publishing an eclectic mix of books focusing on collaborations, poetry in translation, and Argentinian culture and Jewish history in Latin America.

properties.name: Fantagraphics Bookstore & Gallery
properties.description: Renowned comics and graphic novel publisher and indie bookstore.

properties.name: Floating Bridge Press
properties.description: Publishes Washington State poets whose writing engages individuals, enriches communities, and enlivens the arts.

properties.name: Gabalfa Press
properties.description: Independent publisher that focuses on stories and authors from the margins.

properties.name: Girl Friday Productions
properties.description: Hybrid publishing branch of renowned independent publishing services agency Girl Friday Productions.

properties.name: Laughing Elephant
properties.description: Producer of books, greeting cards, and more inspired by vintage ephemera.

properties.name: Lucia|Marquand
properties.description: Develops, designs, and produces books with museums, artists, creative professionals, publishers, and collectors.

properties.name: Modernist Cuisine
properties.description: Publishers of the award-winning and internationally recognized Modernist Cuisine series.

properties.name: Mountaineers Books
properties.address: 7700 Sand Point Way NE, Seattle, WA 98115
properties.description: Storefront for leading independent publisher of outdoor recreation, lifestyle, and conservation books since 1960.

properties.name: Raven Chronicles
properties.description: Independent press and literary organization established in 1991 to showcase art and writing embodying the cultural diversity of writers and artists.

properties.name: Sasquatch Books
properties.description: Publishes gifted writers, chefs, naturalists, artists, and thought leaders in the Pacific Northwest, as well as children’s books and self-exploration books for young adults.

properties.name: Sublunary Press
properties.address: 568 First Ave S, Ste 120 Seattle, WA 98104
properties.description: Independent publisher of contemporaneous literature. Home of the magazine Firmament and imprint Empyrean Series devoted to neglected historic works.

properties.name: University of Washington Press
properties.description: Oldest and largest publisher of scholarly and general interest books in the Pacific Northwest.

properties.name: Vertvolta Press
properties.description: Designs and facilitates production of high-quality books for clients of all types.

properties.name: Wave Books
properties.description: Award-winning independent poetry press dedicated to publishing exceptional contemporary poetry, poetry in translation, and writing by poets.

properties.name: Whit Press
properties.description: Nonprofit publishing organization dedicated to the transformational power of the written word.
